title: Nobel Prize in Medicine 2024 Awarded for MicroRNA Discovery
summary: Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun honored for their discovery of microRNA and its pivotal role in post-transcriptional gene regulation.
content: The Nobel Asembly at Karolinska Institutet has decided to award the 2024 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine jointly to Victor Ambros and Gary Ruvkun for the discovery of microRNA and its role in post-transcriptional gene regulation.
